snippet.title: Rain on Your Parade - OLD Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Play The Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1213230/Rain_on_Your_Parade/

Travel the world as a mischievous cloud set to rain on everyone’s parade! Unlock new methods of causing mayhem and destruction across a wide range of short and sweet levels each with their own unique objectives. This is the ultimate schadenfreude simulator.

Rain on Your Parade is a slapstick comedy game where you play as a mischievous cloud determined to ruin everybody’s day. Play across a wide range of levels while unlocking new abilities and mechanics that get progressively more ridiculous.
